name: Kelsi Davies: Haunt Escape
storyline:
Deep in the heart of the forest lies the Moonlight Tunnel, a place steeped in mystery and legend. Many have dared to enter its depths, but few have returned to tell the tale. It is said that those who do venture into the tunnel are approached by dark forces, spirits and strange cults who lurk in the shadows.

In 1915, a young girl named May and her family lived nearby, but tragedy struck when they were brutally murdered. May, along with her doll, managed to escape into the tunnels, but was never seen again. Some say her spirit still haunts the tunnel.

Outside the tunnel rumors circulate of a powerful artifact, and cults vying for its possession. It is said that a dark force, an ancient demon, has been unleashed and now possesses the spirit of one of the victims. The fate of the artifact and the trapped spirit remains unknown.
summary: A first person horror game about ghost hunting. Find spirits that need help, and communicate with them to help them move on. Has exploration, problem solving, as well as moments of stealth and action. Voiced by, and starring Kelsi Davies, a popular social media influencer.
